resources.string: This application is only for the Motorola Droid. If you are truly using a Motorola Droid, you must return to stock Android 2.0.1 before running SM Updater.
Your phone is not rooted. This is required for installing ROMs, but will probably void your warranty. If you choose to continue, we accept no responsibility for anything that happens to your phone.
You have the update.zip ready to exploit!

Reboot in to recovery mode by holding the physical keyboard X while powering on. When the MOTO logo changes to recovery, hold the volume up and camera keys ***AT THE SAME TIME*** to access the menu, and select "apply sdcard:update.zip" with the d-pad. When it finishes, reboot.
Looks like your phone is rooted, but you have not given SMUpdater access yet. You *must* check the remember box!
Your SD card is not mounted. If your SD card is mounted on your computer, you must eject it before running SM Updater.
You must have at least 250MB free on your SD card to install SholesMod. Free space:
Your recovery image needs to be updated. Continuing will void your warranty!
Are you really, really sure? This definitely will void your warranty, and probably will break your recovery mode.
We are ready to flash the ROM.
